door2_west@aladdin.desc[1]: There is a closed steel door.
door2_west@aladdin.name: door2_west
door2_west@aladdin.desc[2]: The steel door to the west is locked.
door2_west@aladdin.desc[0]: There is an open steel door.

ruby@aladdin.name: ruby
ruby@aladdin.desc[0]: The Sacred Treasure is sitting here in a golden hand.

carpet@aladdin.desc[1]: A magic carpet stands here waving to you.
carpet@aladdin.name: carpet
carpet@aladdin.examine: The carpet beckons for you to sit on it.
carpet@aladdin.desc[0]: A carpet has been tossed to the side here.

block@aladdin.name: block
block@aladdin.examine:
There is a nicely scetched picture of Big Bird and Oscar the Grouch on 
the block.

blockage_up@aladdin.name: blockage_up
blockage_up@aladdin.desc[2]: There is no longer an exit leading up.

door1_west@aladdin.desc[1]: There is a closed oak door.
door1_west@aladdin.name: door1_west
door1_west@aladdin.desc[2]: The oak door to the west is locked.
door1_west@aladdin.desc[0]: There is an open oak door.

cracker@aladdin.desc[1]: A cracker, Iago least favorite food item, lies untouched on the floor.
cracker@aladdin.name: cracker
cracker@aladdin.desc[0]: A cracker has been left here.

guardsword@aladdin.name: guardsword
guardsword@aladdin.desc[0]: A castle guard has accidently left a sword lying around.

flame@aladdin.name: flame
flame@aladdin.desc[0]: In the room's center sits a flame in a ring of stones.

orange@aladdin.name: orange
orange@aladdin.desc[0]: An orange lies here on the ground.

key@aladdin.name: key
key@aladdin.desc[0]: A key has been left here.

banana@aladdin.name: banana
banana@aladdin.desc[0]: A banana lies here on the ground.

hourglass@aladdin.desc[1]: Princess Jasmine is here, struggling to breathe in a quickly filling hourglass.
hourglass@aladdin.name: hourglass
hourglass@aladdin.desc[0]: Sand is spilled everywhere from a broken hourglass.

sesame_north@aladdin.name: sesame_north
sesame_north@aladdin.desc[0]: A wall has been opened in the north wall allowing passage.

snakestaff@aladdin.name: snakestaff
snakestaff@aladdin.desc[0]: Jafer's Snake Staff lies here, eyes glowing.

turban@aladdin.desc[1]: You found a turban hanging here.
turban@aladdin.name: turban
turban@aladdin.examine: There seem to be many folds to put things in.
turban@aladdin.desc[0]: An arab turban has been left here.

cracker1@aladdin.desc[1]: A cracker, Iago least favorite food item, lies untouched on the floor.
cracker1@aladdin.name: cracker1
cracker1@aladdin.desc[0]: A cracker has been left here.

lamp@aladdin.desc[1]: An old dirty lamp sits here on a lighted pedastal.
lamp@aladdin.name: lamp
lamp@aladdin.examine: There's some writing on it, but it's too dirty to read.
lamp@aladdin.desc[0]: An old lamp has been dropped here.

torch@aladdin.name: torch
torch@aladdin.desc[0]: A worn and used old torch has been left here.

blockage_down@aladdin.name: blockage_down
blockage_down@aladdin.desc[2]: The lion's mouth has closed and sunk into the ground.

door3_up@aladdin.desc[1]: There is a closed oak door.
door3_up@aladdin.name: door3_up
door3_up@aladdin.desc[2]: The oak door to the east is locked.
door3_up@aladdin.desc[0]: There is an open oak door.

door3_down@aladdin.desc[1]: There is a closed oak door.
door3_down@aladdin.name: door3_down
door3_down@aladdin.desc[2]: The oak door to the east is locked.
door3_down@aladdin.desc[0]: There is an open oak door.

door1_east@aladdin.desc[1]: There is a closed oak door.
door1_east@aladdin.name: door1_east
door1_east@aladdin.desc[2]: The oak door to the east is locked.
door1_east@aladdin.desc[0]: There is an open oak door.

gems@aladdin.name: gems
gems@aladdin.desc[0]: A bag of gems lies here.

sesame_south@aladdin.name: sesame_south
sesame_south@aladdin.desc[0]: A wall has been opened in the south wall allowing passage.

cape@aladdin.desc[1]: The genie has left you a princess's cape.
cape@aladdin.name: cape
cape@aladdin.desc[0]: A stunning cape lies at your feet.

door2_east@aladdin.desc[1]: There is a closed steel door.
door2_east@aladdin.name: door2_east
door2_east@aladdin.desc[2]: The steel door to the east is locked.
door2_east@aladdin.desc[0]: There is an open steel door.

drawer@aladdin.name: drawer
drawer@aladdin.examine: The drawer is partially open.  You may want to look inside.

apple@aladdin.name: apple
apple@aladdin.desc[0]: An apple lies here on the ground.

sdesert@aladdin.title: The Southern Desert
sdesert@aladdin.description:
These desert sands seem endless, but in the distance you spot something
poking out of the sand.  Is it another mirage?

oasis5@aladdin.title: In an Oasis
oasis5@aladdin.description:
You have entered a piece of the oasis with oddly shaped trees.  One tree
in particular appears to have the shape of a stick figure doing an improve
to "Walk Like An Arab" as the wind causes it to sway.  While yet another one
twists and turns high into the sky.

palace9@aladdin.title: Jafar's Throne Room
palace9@aladdin.description:
Jafar has created himself quite a nice throne room since last you saw him.
He has evidentally wished for great riches, for they are piled everywhere.

oasis2@aladdin.title: In an Oasis
oasis2@aladdin.description:
There is an abundance of exotic trees, bushes, and even some grass.  In
the distance you see many cacti that deserts are known for.
   You wish everyday in the desert were like this as you meander about
lazily.

palace10@aladdin.title: Somewhere in the Palace
palace10@aladdin.description: You are in the palace.  Halls lead east and west.

slip@aladdin.title: You Slipped
slip@aladdin.description:
Didn't I say now would be a bad time to slip?  So why didn't you listen?
You fall endlessly forever and ever, but die sometime within that.  Sorry.

gold4@aladdin.title: Within the Mounds of Gold
gold4@aladdin.description:
Piles and piles of riches and jewels everywhere.  The glitter is
overwhelming, you've never seen such a large amount of riches in your life.

palace6@aladdin.title: Dead End?
palace6@aladdin.description:
It appears you have come to a dead end.  The hall leads back to the west.
You notice many foot prints in the dirt that appear to begin at the north
wall.  Scanning over this north wall, one particular marble block catches
your eye.

tower@aladdin.title: Atop the Castle Tower
tower@aladdin.description:
Well, you've saved Agrabah from sure destruction and the evil rule of
Jafar.  You will be held in high esteem forever and ever.
   So 'Aladdin', you have but one wish left.  Choose wisely.

gold5@aladdin.title: Within the Mounds of Gold
gold5@aladdin.description:
Piles and piles of riches and jewels everywhere.  There must millions and
millions of points worth of stuff here.  You take a quick break to dive into
one large pile of coins.  After swimming for awhile, you decide to move
along.

gold9@aladdin.title: On the Stairs
gold9@aladdin.description:
You are on a long, stone stairway with many cracks and chips deteriorating
from time alone.  You look to over the stairs on both sides of you and see
nothing but pure blackness.  This would not be a good time to slip.

stairs@aladdin.title: Stairway to Top of the Tower
stairs@aladdin.description:
You are in a spiral stairway which appears to lead to the top of a tower.
Soon remember how much you hate spiral stairways as you look down through the
stairway's center.

gold2@aladdin.title: Within the Mounds of Gold
gold2@aladdin.description:
Piles and piles of riches and jewels everywhere.  The glitter is
overwhelming, you've never seen such great amounts of riches.

gold6@aladdin.title: Within the Mounds of Gold
gold6@aladdin.description:
More gold and jewels.  How crazy is this?  If you could take all of this
stuff you could probably wiz 1... 2... 3 thousand times!  But since you
can't, you might as well just go north or south.

palace@aladdin.title: Inside the Palace
palace@aladdin.description:
As make your way and finally enter the palace, you bow down before the
princess and her father, the sultan.  Jafar, the evil sorceror of Agrabah,
has forseen your arrival and is ready for you.

gold10@aladdin.title: At the Top

lamp1@aladdin.title: Genie's Dwelling
lamp1@aladdin.description: What are you doing inside the Genie's Lamp??

palace11@aladdin.title: Another Hallway
palace11@aladdin.description:
You are in an east/west hallway.  Looking around, you notice nothing worth
taking note of.

gold8@aladdin.title: Base of the Stairs
gold8@aladdin.description:
You stand before a stairway leading to a small stone pillar extending from
who-knows-where.  At the top, you can see a bright light shining down onto a
pedastal.

gold3@aladdin.title: Within the Mounds of Gold
gold3@aladdin.description:
Jewels, jewels, and more jewels...  It does not seem to end.  You stop for
a second to pinch yourself, wondering if you are really awake.  A pile of
gems block exit to the south while the largest golden urn you've ever seen
blocks passage to the west.  This leaves north and east open.

entry@aladdin.title: Before the Cave of Wonders
entry@aladdin.description:
As you walk closer, a large head and mouth forms up from the sands ahead.
You now stand before the entrance to the Cave of Wonders.  It doesn't look
all that inviting.  But if you'd like to look a little closer, stairs lead
down.  Safety is back up.

oasis1@aladdin.title: In an Oasis
oasis1@aladdin.description:
You are in a beautiful desert oasis.  There are trees surrounding you and
a nice cool breeze blows through your hair.   Paths lead to the north, south,
east, and west.

palace2@aladdin.title: Somewhere in the Palace
palace2@aladdin.description:
This poor palace.  What Jafar has done to it.  Your heart swells with anger
as you notice the slime covering the once polished marble castle walls.  You
hear screams and moans of terror coming from far off areas of the castle.

trapped@aladdin.title: Trapped in the Cave of Wonders
trapped@aladdin.description:
You appear to be trapped in the Cave of Wonders.  Abu's greedy mistake has
caused the cave mouth to close down, leaving no obvious means of exiting
this now dark and dreary place... but hey - It happens to the best of us.

cliff@aladdin.title: On an Icy Cliff
cliff@aladdin.description:
It appears as though you have lost the help of the genie this time around.
Jafar has no lamp, and your doom is most likely sealed.  You are stuck
miles upon miles away and to make matters worse,  you seem you have lost your
carpet.  You better think quick.

palace12@aladdin.title: Ashkan's Room
palace12@aladdin.description:
This is the head guardsman's room.  One thing's for sure...  If you save
this place, the sultan's gonna need some new help.  There is no more than
large oak desk with an open drawer and one chair.  You wonder why this Ashkan
guy even needs his own room.

palace5@aladdin.title: Palace Hallway
palace5@aladdin.description:
You are still in the palace.  The floor is covered with dirt and you
notice numerous footprints leading to the east.  The passage leads off to the
east and west.

palace7@aladdin.title: The Hidden Guard Room
palace7@aladdin.description:
It appears as though Jafar assumed you would make it this far.  There is
nothing of particular interest in this room.

gold1@aladdin.title: Surrounded by Mounds of Gold
gold1@aladdin.description:
You finish your descent of the stairs to find yourself in the middle of
unbelievable mounds of treasure.  You are too scared to touch any of it
though.

oasis4@aladdin.title: In an Oasis
oasis4@aladdin.description:
You wish everyday in the desert were like this as you meander about
lazily.  There is a beautiful pool of clear sparkling water.  It reflects
the sun sending rays shooting off everywhere.

oasis3@aladdin.title: In an Oasis
oasis3@aladdin.description:
You wish everyday in the desert were like this as you meander about
lazily.

palace4@aladdin.title: Long Straight Hall
palace4@aladdin.description: You are in a long straight hall leading east and west.

palace8@aladdin.title: Iago's Room
palace8@aladdin.description:
This room is filled with various perches, parrot toys, and gold coins.
Pictures of various birds line the walls.  A "Playbird" centerfold featuring
Rockin' Robin is posted to the ceiling.

gold7@aladdin.title: Within the Mounds of Gold
gold7@aladdin.description:
You are in a dark cave.  There are no fabulous mounds of gold and jewels
here.  There is but one large glaring gem calling to you.  There is an exit
to the north which will bring you into the caves of riches.  To the east
you see a long stairway.

palace3@aladdin.title: Corner Hallway
palace3@aladdin.description:
You wander through the palace.  Looking above, you notice the bright
candle chandeliers that line the ceiling of these halls are no longer lit.
Cob webs cover the walls, stringing everywhere.  The halls lead off to the
north and east.

palace1@aladdin.title: Back in the Palace
palace1@aladdin.description:
The palace does not seem the same as it was the last time you were here.
You can feel Jafar's evil presence all around you.  He should know you have
returned.  You can expect a nice welcome party awaiting you throughout the
castle.  Halls lead to the east and south. There is a gate behind you, well,
you are stuck.

cave@aladdin.title: Cave of Wonders
cave@aladdin.description:
You walk through a large open lion's mouth and find yourself in the Cave
of Wonders.  As you move forward, a voice growls, "Only those of purest heart
may enter."  There is a long stairway in front of you leading down into the
darkness of the lion's throat. You may also chicken out and go back up.

parade@aladdin.title: The Parade for a Prince
parade@aladdin.description:
Well, it looks like the Genie has granted your wish!  You are in a parade
heading into Agrabah, home of the beautiful, and unmarried Princess Jasmine!
Crowds line the streets just waiting to catch a single glimpse of you.  You
bow and wave to your cheering fans as you are bombarded with an abundance
of flowers.

guard9@aladdin.name: guard9
guard9@aladdin.description: Ashkan, the guard leader, is not pleased to see you.

abu@aladdin.name: abu
abu@aladdin.description: There is a playful monkey swinging around here.

princess@aladdin.name: princess
princess@aladdin.description: Princess Jasmine stares deeply into your eyes.

guard5@aladdin.name: guard5
guard5@aladdin.description: Mammad has been awaiting your arrival.

guard2@aladdin.name: guard2
guard2@aladdin.description: Ali, a castle guard, prepares to attack.

guard6@aladdin.name: guard6
guard6@aladdin.description: Omid smiles, showing off his golden tooth.

jafar@aladdin.name: jafar
jafar@aladdin.description: Jafar says, 'I dare you to challenge me...  You street rat!'

guard8@aladdin.name: guard8
guard8@aladdin.description: Bijan is really tired and really wants to kill you so he can take a nap.

genie2@aladdin.name: genie2
genie2@aladdin.description:
An all powerful, blue Genie floats here looking at you with hopeful eyes.
He longs to be free and all you have to do is say it.

beast@aladdin.name: beast
beast@aladdin.description: The Icy Beast roars at the sight of its new found dinner.

sultan@aladdin.name: sultan
sultan@aladdin.description: The Sultan of Agrabah, Jasmine's father, is very pleased to see you.

genie1@aladdin.name: genie1
genie1@aladdin.description: An allpowerful, blue Genie floats here.

guard3@aladdin.name: guard3
guard3@aladdin.description: Mohammed, a castle guard, prepares to attack.

guard4@aladdin.name: guard4
guard4@aladdin.description: Hooman the guard sharpens his sword looking forward to killing you.

snake@aladdin.name: snake
snake@aladdin.description: Slimey the Snake hung quietly from a tree... until you wandered in.

guard1@aladdin.name: guard1
guard1@aladdin.description: Abdul is one of the more fashionably dressed castle guards.

guard7@aladdin.name: guard7
guard7@aladdin.description: Amon, a castle guard, prepares to attack.

iago@aladdin.name: iago
iago@aladdin.description: Iago screechs 'I will kill you if you give me another cracker!'
